title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Information Literacy Enhancement for Science Teachers in the Digital Age

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in utilizing basic digital tools and knowledge of secondary-level science curriculum
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three instructional designs that effectively integrate information technology tools when designing science lessons.
Learners can apply a five-step process to evaluate and select reliable scientific information in digital environments.
Learners can design mobile-based interactive learning activities and share feedback with peer teachers.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
